mapper.insert: insert into display ( group_id, display_name, display_context, machine_code, status ) values ( #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayContext,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{machineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select id, group_id, display_name, display_context, machine_code, status, create_time from display where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
